title: Ceramic Dragon Bowl
subtitle: Ceramic - Wheel thrown and Hand build
alt: clay bowl with a molded dragon head and a curled dragon tail, it has wings flattened to it's side
description:
2025 

This piece is a combination of wheel thrown and hand built. The base of the bowl was thrown on a wheel, dried halfway to leather hard, and trimmed. From that, I built the dragon onto it and carved out the features. I used coils to built out some of the dragon as well as seal everything together.
